definition: to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching

pinyin: jian4 gou4 zheng4 yi4 li3 lun4

sentences.english: Reading comprehension is a reading process where readers can construct the meaning of version.
sentences.chinese: 读解就是读者建构文本意义的阅读过程。

sentences.english: The theory of constructionism contributes to the psychology teaching.
sentences.chinese: 建构主义理论对于心理学教学改革有着重要的启示。

sentences.english: Constructivism is a revolution of contemporary educational psychology.
sentences.chinese: 建构主义是当代教育心理学的一场革命。

sentences.english: Thus, understanding these complex factors helps to build the lexicon theory.
sentences.chinese: 了解这些复杂因素，有助于“词库”理论的建构。

sentences.english: The first one is the construction of the Oberlin Student Center.
sentences.chinese: 其一，建构奥柏林学生活动中心。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter for secondary school education career planning of curriculum system construction.
sentences.chinese: 第五章为中职学校生涯规划教育课程体系的建构。

sentences.english: Could you please explaining briefly on your thinking of the conflicts between ontology and constructionism?
sentences.chinese: 您是否可以对本体论和建构论之间的悖论稍作解释？

sentences.english: I consider that we can understand essence of science throught constructural realism.
sentences.chinese: 本文试图通过建构的实在论来理解科学的本质问题。

sentences.english: The construction of the theory plays an important role in the building of the discipline system of Redology.
sentences.chinese: 学科理论之建构，也是红学学科体系建设的重要课题。

sentences.english: It is structured and ordered into a few basic regime types.
sentences.chinese: 它是经建构与安排成数种基本政体类型。

sentences.english: Through these questions, Mencius put forward the ultimate basis of goodness.
sentences.chinese: 通过对善的不断追问，孟子为善建构了形上学的根据。

sentences.english: The house construction and the view of people overlap.
sentences.chinese: 家屋的建构与人观是叠合在一起的。

sentences.english: Students'automatic development helps to the reasonable costruction of teachers'authority .
sentences.chinese: 学生自主发展能够促进教师权威的合理建构。

sentences.english: Individual should be re-planning geographical imagination, and construct happiness space in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 个体应该重新规划地理想象，在内心建构幸福空间。

sentences.english: Constructivism learning theory is an important theoretical basis for contemporary researches on classroom instruction.
sentences.chinese: 建构主义学习观是当代课堂教学研究的重要理论基础。

sentences.english: Confucian academic legitimacy rebuilding under the influence of political reforms and academic changes.
sentences.chinese: 政局变革与学术变迁影响下的儒学正统性建构。
